comment: This is a grid of Chinese characters in seal script (篆书), arranged in columns with phonetic annotations (反切) written vertically below each character. The page appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or calligraphy manual, possibly related to the *Shuowen Jiezi* or similar works. The right margin contains vertical text: '小二百十八' (page number or section marker) and '嚴華' (likely the name of the compiler or publisher).
